"Summary": "- Mountaire Farms is a family owned and operated company that has been in business for more than 100 years.\n- The company is headquartered in Millsboro, Delaware and has operations in Arkansas, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, and North Carolina.\n- Mountaire is the fourth largest chicken company in the United States.\n- The company is committed to giving back to the communities where it does business.\n- Mountaire has a long history of supporting animal welfare and environmental sustainability.",

search_result.Description: Get the latest news and press releases from Mountaire Farms. Check out our updates!
search_result.Concated_text:
Title:Newsroom
Link:https://mountaire.com/newsroom/
Description:Get the latest news and press releases from Mountaire Farms. Check out our updates!
search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "This Mountaire Farms Newsroom subpage showcases the company's press releases concerning their latest developments. Visitors can find press releases organized by years, with 2024 releases at the top followed by releases from 2023, 2022, and 2021, all the way down to 2019. Users can also browse press releases by topic, with categories including Sustainable Farming, Health & Nutrition, Animal Welfare, and Community Outreach. \n\nThe page is accessible from the main Mountaire Farms website, where various topics ranging from products and ethics to employment and investing are covered.",
"Company Name": "Mountaire Farms",
"Email": null,
"Phone Number": "877-887-1490",
"Address": "P. O. Box 1320 Millsboro, DE 19966",
"Product Information": "At Mountaire Farms, we pride ourselves on providing our customers with the highest quality chicken products. Our chickens are raised on a vegetarian diet and are free of antibiotics and hormones. We offer a wide variety of chicken products, including whole chickens, breasts, thighs, wings, and drumsticks. We also offer a variety of pre-cooked chicken products, such as rotisserie chickens, grilled chicken strips, and chicken nuggets. All of our chicken products are inspected by the USDA and are safe to eat.",
"Representative": null,
"Useful Information": "Mountaire Farms is a family-owned and -operated company that has been in business for over 60 years. We are committed to providing our customers with the highest quality chicken products, and we are proud to be a part of the American agricultural community.\n\nIn addition to our commitment to providing high-quality chicken products, we are also committed to giving back to our community. We support a variety of local charities and organizations, and we are always looking for ways to make a difference in the lives of others."
}

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
        "Summary": "The wholesale operations of Mountaire Farms involves delivering fresh and frozen jumbo bird products to US states and international destinations. The company offers a variety of products: boneless skinless breast, clipped tenders, boneless skinless thigh meat, boneless skinless leg meat, party wings, whole wings, leg quarters, whole legs, drumsticks, MSC, and various other cuts and organs. Mountaire Farms also offers branded products under “Blue Label” and “Noor Al-Jabal.” Wholesale operations are handled from their facilities in Delaware and North Carolina.",
        "Company Name": "Mountaire Farms",
        "Email": "None",
        "Phone Number": "Local: 302-934-1100\nToll Free: 877-887-1490",
        "Address": "P. O. Box 1320 Millsboro, DE 19966",
        "Product Information": "Boneless skinless breast, clipped tenders, boneless skinless thigh meat, boneless skinless leg meat, party wings, whole wings, leg quarters, whole legs, drumsticks, MSC, whole birds, legs, drums, leg quarters, party wings, whole wings, boneless skinless thigh meat, boneless skinless leg meat, boneless skinless breasts, tenders",
        "Representative": "None",
        "Useful Information": "Mountaire Farms is a family-owned and -operated company that has been in business for over 60 years. \nThe company is the 6th largest poultry producer in the United States and employs over 8,000 people."

search_result.link_content_summary:
{
"Summary": "- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v21.8 - Mountaire Farms (collectively Mountaire Corporation and its two operating affiliates, Mountaire Farms Inc. and Mountaire Farms of Delaware, Inc.) are agricultural food production and processing companies providing work for over 10,000 people at facilities in Arkansas, Delaware, Maryland, Virginia, and North Carolina.\n- The company was founded in 1914 by Guy Cameron and is still family owned and remain dedicated to giving back to the communities where they do business.\n- Mountaire's culture is what defines them and sets the company apart from the competition.\n- Mountaire Farms is committed to operational excellence which means they deliver high quality products to their customers at an affordable price.\n- The company's commitment to sustainability means they adhere to strict animal welfare guidelines throughout their vertically integrated process because they are committed to the health and welfare of their birds, and ultimately, to the consumers who purchase their products.",
"Company Name": "Mountaire Farms        Mountaire Farms",
"Email": "None",
"Phone Number": "Local: 302-934-1100Toll Free: 877-887-1490",
"Address": "P. O. Box 1320 Millsboro, DE 19966",
"Product Information": "Wholesale\nRetail\nInternational\nChicken Paws Authenticity",
"Representative": "None",
"Useful Information": "The company's commitment to sustainability means they adhere to strict animal welfare guidelines throughout their vertically integrated process because they are committed to the health and welfare of their birds, and ultimately, to the consumers who purchase their products."
}

Mountaire Cares is their community outreach program, which includes giving back to the community, leadership, scholarships, meals for thousands, a Chickin’ Pickin’ Championship, and service projects. They also have a scholarship program and a variety of other initiatives.",
